definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle

sentences.english: The northeast of the encampment direction, spread the turning of helicopter propeller of Ya Ya voice.
sentences.chinese: 營地東北方向，傳來軋軋的直升機螺旋槳的轉動聲。

sentences.english: The sewing machine was clicking away.
Small motorboats chug out of the harbor.
sentences.chinese: 小摩托艇軋軋地駛出海港。

sentences.english: A toy train chugs on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 一個玩具火車在地板上發出軋軋聲。

sentences.english: Heavy tanks ground down the road.
sentences.chinese: 重型坦克軋軋地沿着馬路開過去。

sentences.english: I lay and listened to the rain on the canvas and the clicking of the car over the rails.
sentences.chinese: 我躺着傾聽帆布上的雨聲和列車在路軌上開的軋軋聲。

sentences.english: The spindles kept up their regular hum on all sides without pause.
sentences.chinese: 紡錘從四面勻速地轉動，不斷地發出軋軋的響聲。
縫紉機忙碌地軋軋響着。
